title: Le manteau royal
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Large twisting tree and elaborate arrangement of oriental poppy-like blooms with scarf and mantle filled with fleur-de-lys and elaborate trophies with tassels and music books. In red on white.
